languages.text: "Какой пылкий монолог, Инскрибия. К вышесказанному еще будут поправки, дополнения… оправдания?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты забыла свое место, Инскрибия. Кому-то нужно тебя остановить, и это буду я. Есть что сказать в свое оправдание?"

languages.text: "A fiery speech indeed, Inscribia. Shall we expect amendments, additions... or perhaps excuses?"
languages.original_text: "Какой пылкий монолог, Инскрибия. К вышесказанному еще будут поправки, дополнения… оправдания?"

traits.locale_text: "A fiery speech indeed, Inscirbia. Shall we expect amendments, additions… or perhaps excuses?"
"You have forgotten your place, Inscribia. You must be stopped, and this duty falls to me. Do you have anything to say in your defence?"
"A fiery speech indeed, Inscribia. Shall we expect amendments, additions... or perhaps excuses?"
"A fiery speech indeed, Inscribia. Shall we expect amendments, additions... or perhaps excuses?"
"You have forgotten your place, Inscribia. You must be stopped, and that duty falls to me. Do you have anything to say in your defence?"
"You have forgotten your place, Inscribia. You must be stopped, and that duty falls to me. Do you have anything to say in your defence?"
"You have forgotten your place, Inscribia. You must be stopped, and that duty falls to me. Do you have anything to say in your defence?"
"A fiery speech indeed, Inscirbia. Shall we expect amendments, additions… or perhaps excuses?"

languages.text: "Das war wirklich eine feurige Rede, Inscribia. Sollen wir mit Ergänzungen, Anpassungen ... oder gar Entschuldigungen rechnen?"
languages.original_text: "A fiery speech indeed, Inscribia. Shall we expect amendments, additions... or perhaps excuses?"

traits.locale_text: "Das war wirklich eine feurige Rede, Inscribia. Sollen wir mit Ergänzungen, Anpassungen ... oder gar Entschuldigungen rechnen?"

languages.text: « Un discours des plus enflammés s'il en est, Inscribia. Devons-nous nous attendre à des amendements, à des ajouts... ou peut-être à des excuses ? »
languages.original_text: "A fiery speech indeed, Inscribia. Shall we expect amendments, additions... or perhaps excuses?"

traits.locale_text: « Un discours des plus enflammés s'il en est, Inscribia. Devons-nous nous attendre à des amendements, à des ajouts... ou peut-être à des excuses ? »

languages.text: “这还真是场热情洋溢的演说啊，缮师。后面还有没有什么补充法案、修正条例……或是什么借口之类的？”
languages.original_text: "A fiery speech indeed, Inscribia. Shall we expect amendments, additions... or perhaps excuses?"

traits.locale_text: “这还真是场热情洋溢的演说啊，缮师。后面还有没有什么补充法案、修正条例……或是什么借口之类的？”

languages.text: «Un discurso vehemente, Inscribia. ¿Podemos esperar enmiendas, añadidos... o tal vez excusas?».
languages.original_text: "A fiery speech indeed, Inscribia. Shall we expect amendments, additions... or perhaps excuses?"

traits.locale_text: «Un discurso vehemente, Inscribia. ¿Podemos esperar enmiendas, añadidos... o tal vez excusas?».

languages.text: 「インスクリビア、君は自分の立場を忘れている。君は止められなければならなかった。その義務は{mf|俺|私}にある。何か弁明はあるか？」
languages.original_text: "You have forgotten your place, Inscribia. You must be stopped, and that duty falls to me. Do you have anything to say in your defence?"

traits.locale_text: 「インスクリビア、君は自分の立場を忘れている。君は止められなければならなかった。その義務は{mf|俺|私}にある。何か弁明はあるか？」

languages.text: "Ateşli bir konuşma yaptın İnscribia. Değişiklikler, eklemeler... Hatta bahaneler beklemeli miyiz?"
languages.original_text: "A fiery speech indeed, Inscribia. Shall we expect amendments, additions... or perhaps excuses?"

traits.locale_text: "Ateşli bir konuşma yaptın İnscribia. Değişiklikler, eklemeler... Hatta bahaneler beklemeli miyiz?"
